tests.name: create map from named tuples
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (k1 VARCHAR, k2 VARCHAR, v1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT MAP(k1:=v1, k2:=v1*2) as M FROM TEST;

tests.name: create map from key/value lists
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ks ARRAY<VARCHAR>, vals ARRAY<INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT AS_MAP(ks, vals) as m FROM TEST;
